lead_paragraph: Everton manager Ronald Koeman says his team must win the midfield battle and keep the likes of Christian Eriksen and Dele Alli quiet to stand any chance of an away win at Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League on Sunday.
snippet: Everton manager Ronald Koeman says his team must win the midfield battle and keep the likes of Christian Eriksen and Dele Alli quiet to stand any chance of an away win at Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League on Sunday....
